name: Fear my Stick!
description:
Fear my Stick! is a 2D party game where up to 8 players clash into weird fights for the glory of crazy gods, unleashing mighty and totally absurd powers to defeat their enemies !

It's time to fight

Take down your friends with punches, lasers, mad kiwis, explosions, high speed crates, more kiwis, ... There is a thousand ways to dominate the arena !

Just plug and play

There is no need to learn how to fight like a stick ; it's boiling in your veins ! Just grab your gamepad and enjoy weird physics, wild punches and crazy superpowers (have we already told you about kiwis ?)

There is no end

You can play any time you want to. A five minute pause ? Just go for a few rounds. An entire afternoon to spend playing with friends ? Fight endlessly, as the battle for Stickfinity knows no limit.

/!\ Supports only XBox gamepad (for now)

Oh, and just in case :

(be sure to remember them)
